actions.text: On agreeing to the Salmon amendment (A018) Agreed to by recorded vote: 433 - 0 (Roll no. 264).

description: Amendment requires States to adopt procedures to automatically put liens against the property of persons for delinquent child support payments ordered by another State.
purpose: An amendment to require states to adopt procedures to automatically honor liens against property of persons for delinquent child support payments ordered by another state.
